segments.text: I feel a sense of sadness looking at this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so distracted, not noticing the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad to see the kids trying to sneak cookies, thinking they have to hide their actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, and it makes me sad to think he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the girl, just standing there, waiting for a cookie, not understanding the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad to see the water just going to waste, overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a sense of melancholy looking at this ordinary kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad to think that no one is paying attention to what's really happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the woman, who might slip on the wet floor at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just filled with little sadness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't shake this feeling of sadness looking at this picture.
segments.speaker: PAR
